articles.title: Harvard Coop now lets shoppers create their own AI-illustrated books in-store
articles.description:
Shoppers can draft a book for free, buy digital copies, or order hardcover editions starting at $35.

The post Harvard Coop now lets shoppers create their own AI-illustrated books in-store appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Harvard Coop now lets shoppers create their own AI

articles.title: Protest is what punk rock bands do, said Ken Casey of Dropkick Murphys, and more of them should
articles.description:
Casey, principal songwriter and bass player for the Celtic punk band Dropkick Murphys, was asked to opine on the theme of this year’s Globe Summit: revolutionary ideas.

The post Protest is what punk rock bands do, said Ken Casey of Dropkick Murphys, and more of them should appeared first on Boston.com.
